text: The Qatar national futsal team represents Qatar in international futsal completions. They have qualified for the AFC Futsal Championship three times and are yet to feature at the FIFA Futsal World Cup. ==Tournaments== ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== World Cup Record World Cup Record World
